topic.description: After Facebook’s Q4 2018 earnings call, what were experts’ predictions and expectations for its stock price in 2019? How did these predictions fare over time? Relevant material would include predictions immediately following the Jan 29, 2019, earnings call, and later actual stock performance that could be used to evaluate predictions.
